title: Rusty Patched Bumble Bee Screening Tool

elements.name: federal_nexus
elements.title: Is this a federal action, or a non-federal action with federal funding, authorization, or permit involvement (a federal nexus)?

elements.name: hpz_overlap
elements.title: Does the action area overlap a rusty patched bumble bee High Potential Zone (for example, based on Information for Planning and Consultation results)?

elements.name: habitat_present
elements.title: Does the action area contain rusty patched bumble bee habitat (nesting, foraging, or overwintering habitat)?
elements.description: Examples: upland forests (overwintering), grasslands/shrublands/edges (nesting), and areas with season-long flowering resources (foraging).

elements.name: activities_selected
elements.title: Which activities are included in the action or are reasonably certain to occur? (Select all that apply.)
choices: Ground disturbance (grading, trenching, excavation, heavy equipment)
Vegetation management (mowing, brush cutting, tree removal, haying, grazing)
Added lanes or major road expansion
Managed or commercial bees introduced (honey bees or managed bumble bees)
Seed collection from native flowering plants
Rodent control affecting native rodents or burrows
Drainage changes or increased surface flooding or soil saturation

elements.name: active_season_work
elements.title: Will any work occur during the rusty patched bumble bee active flight period (spring through fall)?

elements.name: overwinter_season_ground
elements.title: Will ground disturbance occur during the overwintering period (late fall through early spring)?

pages.name: forage
pages.title: Forage habitat effects
pages.visibleIf: {activities_selected} contains 'Vegetation management (mowing, brush cutting, tree removal, haying, grazing)' or {activities_selected} contains 'Prescribed fire'

elements.name: forage_unavailable
elements.title: Will the action remove flowering plants, reduce blooms, or otherwise make forage unavailable (even temporarily)?

elements.name: forage_acres
elements.title: Acres of foraging habitat affected within the High Potential Zone (if known)

pages.name: chemicals
pages.title: Chemical use details
pages.visibleIf: {activities_selected} contains 'Herbicide application' or {activities_selected} contains 'Insecticide application' or {activities_selected} contains 'Fungicide application'

elements.name: insecticide_used
elements.title: Will insecticides be applied in or near habitat within the High Potential Zone?

elements.name: fungicide_used
elements.title: Will fungicides be applied in or near habitat within the High Potential Zone?

elements.name: herbicide_used
elements.title: Will herbicides be applied in or near habitat within the High Potential Zone?

elements.name: herbicide_method
elements.title: Herbicide method
choices: Spot-only (wicking, glove, cut-stump, basal bark, limited spot spray)

elements.name: herbicide_exposure_risk
elements.title: Could herbicide contact bees directly (applied when bees are likely active/foraging or when flowering plants are present)?
